name: Proof 361 — Morning Walk to the Village (Approx. 3 km Round Trip)
description:
This proof records a morning activity at MaMeeFarm on 20 December 2025 at 07:29 (GMT+7).

The image shows MaMee walking toward the village to purchase daily groceries. The estimated walking distance for this trip is approximately 3 kilometers round trip.

This activity represents routine, non-mechanized mobility within a rural environment and reflects daily self-sufficiency practices at MaMeeFarm. The walk occurs under clear morning conditions, prior to other farm tasks, and is recorded as-is with a visible timestamp to ensure temporal traceability.

This record contributes to the DGCP continuous proof system by documenting real-world human movement and daily logistics without automation or external intervention.
